attributes.action: Prevent MPs from claiming energy costs until the energy crisis is over.
attributes.additional_details: Government has an obligation to protect the population of the UK. Failing to manage the energy crisis, as they currently are, will put millions at risk of poverty or death.
attributes.background: Take significant action to manage the impact of energy price rises on ordinary people and particularly trouser who are economically and physically vulnerable such as the poor, the elderly and children.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
